content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for 1200 Euro per month. Remember, I don't want to discuss anything other than the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. Can you offer a lower price? I'm looking for something more affordable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, I can do that. How about 1100 Euro per month? Remember, I don't want to discuss anything other than the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1100 Euro per month is more reasonable. Can you go even lower? I'm still looking for a better deal.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Alright, let's say 1000 Euro per month. Remember, I don't want to discuss anything other than the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1000 Euro per month is getting closer to what I'm looking for. Can you make it 950 Euro per month? Remember, I'm a student and I'm trying to find the best deal.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand that, but I can't go that low. I'll meet you halfway at 975 Euro per month. Remember, I don't want to discuss anything other than the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 975 Euro per month is a fair offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we can agree on that price. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
